sourcesContent:
Sample Stocks

Title Symbol Current Price Past Price Time Stamp
{{stock.title}} {{stock.symbol}} {{stock.currentPrice}} {{stock.pastPrice.price}} {{stock.pastPrice.timeStamp}}
import { DecimalPipe } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stocks', templateUrl: './stocks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stocks.component.css'] }) export class StocksComponent { timeStamp = new Date(); stocks: StocksDetails[]= [ { title: "Apple Inc.", symbol: "AAPL", currentPrice: 166.28, pastPrice: { price: 166.10, timeStamp: this.timeStamp.setDate(this.timeStamp.getDate() - 1).toString()} }, { title: "Alphabet Inc.", symbol: "GOOGL", currentPrice: 158.54, pastPrice: { price: 158.10, timeStamp: this.timeStamp.setDate(this.timeStamp.getDate() - 1).toString() } }, { title: "Microsoft Corporation", symbol: "MSFT", currentPrice: 406.63, pastPrice: { price: 406.10, timeStamp: this.timeStamp.setDate(this.timeStamp.getDate() - 1).toString() } }, { title: "Amazon.com Inc.", symbol: "AMZN", currentPrice: 178.53, pastPrice: { price: 178.10, timeStamp: this.timeStamp.setDate(this.timeStamp.getDate() - 1).toString() } }, { title: "Apple Inc.", symbol: "AAPL", currentPrice: 145.53, pastPrice: { price: 145.10, timeStamp: this.timeStamp.setDate(this.timeStamp.getDate() - 1).toString() } } ] } export interface StocksDetails { title: string, symbol: string, currentPrice: number, pastPrice:PriceHistory } export interface PriceHistory { price: number, timeStamp:string }
